p: The continuous applications of insecticides cause the development of resistance in vector species, increase of toxic effects in the food chain, as well as adverse effects on the quality of the environment, which ultimately affect humans and animals. The application of plant extracts with active molecules is an alternative strategy for the control of mosquitoes. Extracts of several plants, such as neem ( Azadirachta indica), piperita ( Mentha piperata), lemon eucalyptus ( Corymbia citriodora), and basil ( Ocimum basilicum), have good repellent effectiveness against some mosquito species ( Nicoletti et al., 2014, Sarwar, 2016b).
